name: arrayIsEmpty
description:
Determines whether an array is empty. Equivalent to arrayLen().
 Calling this function on an array with 10 undefined elements
 will return false.
 CF MX: this function can be used on XML objects.

params.name: array
params.description: An array name or variable name

examples.title: Simple example for arrayIsEmpty function
examples.description: To check an array is empty or not

examples.title: Simple example with member function
examples.description: CF11+ Uses the member function is the same as running arrayIsEmpty.
